thread.title: The Hadid Family’s Latest Look Is Made for Sunday Brunch
thread.title_full: The Hadid Family’s Latest Look Is Made for Sunday Brunch

author: Maria Ward
title: The Hadid Family’s Latest Look Is Made for Sunday Brunch
text:
The Hadid Family’s Latest Look Is Made for Sunday Brunch January 29, 2017 5:08 pm Expand Photo: Getty Images 
For most, a Sunday brunch look usually involves some form of sweatpant and sneaker. But not when you’re in the Hadid family. Model sisters Gigi and Bella were joined by their mother, Yolanda, in New York today for a quick bite at The Smile, the trendy eatery in Lower Manhattan With each stepping out in coordinating denim and sunglasses, they demonstrated that a flair for elevated off-duty style runs in the family. 
Gigi threw on a Tommy Hilfiger bomber, which was complemented by the bright red racing stripe running down the sides of her cropped pants. A flared hem with frayed detail added a kicky element that hit at just the right length to show off a major pair of pointed stilettos. Yolanda opted for distressed skinny jeans topped off with a motorcycle jacket that gave new meaning to yummy-mummy dressing, particularly with a pair of flat leather boots. Bella, on the other hand, took a preppier approach to her attire with a fisherman’s turtleneck sweater and a ladylike Chanel quilted bag layered overtop. She appeared to be borrowing the railroad-stripe button-fly trousers we saw on Gigi earlier this week . After all, these sisters know that a great wardrobe is meant to be shared—a lot like Sunday brunch.
